entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Montréal
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:14 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Trudeau Int'l Airport 9:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: SE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:
